DzDrawStyle Class Reference
[Basic Types, OpenGL Classes]

Encapsulates the drawing parameters for a 3D view. More...

Detailed Description

Encapsulates the drawing parameters for a 3D view.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzDrawStyle::PickingMode

The picking modes

Enumerator:
PickNone 

Default setting - this is not a picking operation

PickFaces 

Draw geometry for picking faces

PickPoints 

Draw geometry for picking points

PickNodes 

Draw geometry for picking nodes

PickMaterials 

Draw geometry for picking materials

enum DzDrawStyle::ShadeStyle

A list of shading styles for rendering scene objects in OpenGL

Enumerator:
WireBox 

Draws unlit wire-frame bounding boxes

SolidBox 

Draws smooth-shaded bounding boxes

Wireframe 

Draws unlit wire-frames

LitWireframe 

Draws lit wire-frames

HiddenLine 

Draws unlit wire-frames, front geometry facing only

WireShaded 

Draws lit smooth shaded objects with wireframes imposed

SmoothShaded 

Draws lit smooth shaded objects

WireTextured 

Draws lit smooth shaded objects with any texture/transparency maps applied and wireframes imposed

Textured 

Draws lit smooth shaded objects with any texture/transparency maps applied

GLSLShader 

Draws lit smooth shaded objects with a GLSL shader applied

Unshaded 

Draws unlit smooth shaded objects

Picking 

Special mode for using OpenGL to determine a selected object when the user clicks in the view

enum DzDrawStyle::TransparencyMode

Flags whether opaque geometry, transparent geometry, or both should be drawn in this pass.

Enumerator:
DrawOpaqueOnly 

Draw Opaque geometry only in this pass

DrawTransparentOnly 

Draw Transparent Geometry only in this pass

DrawBoth 

Draw all geometry in this pass

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzDrawStyle::~DzDrawStyle (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzDrawStyle::DzDrawStyle ( ShadeStyle  style  )  [protected]

Creates a new draw style with the given shading style.

Parameters:
style The style of drawing that this draw style will perform.

Member Function Documentation

bool DzDrawStyle::drawCues (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if visual cues (such as bounding boxes for selected nodes) should be drawn for the current drawing operation, false if visual cues should not be drawn.
See also:
setDrawCuesDefault(), getDrawCuesDefault()
void DzDrawStyle::enableSelectionMaps ( bool  onOff  )  [protected]

Sets whether selection maps are enabled for node picking drawing operations, invalid for other types of drawing operations. By default, selection maps are enabled.

Parameters:
onOff If true, selection maps are enabled, if false, selection maps are disabled.
void DzDrawStyle::forceUseLighting (  )  [slot]

If the current shade style is not using lighting, this method will set the shade style to the nearest match that uses single-pass drawing and lighting.

bool DzDrawStyle::getDrawCuesDefault (  )  const
Returns:
true if visual cues (such as bounding boxes for selected nodes) should be drawn when appropriate, false if visaul cues should never be drawn.
See also:
drawCues(), setDrawCuesDefault()
DzPolySorter * DzDrawStyle::nonOpaqueSorter (  )  const
Returns:
The current poly sorter for non-opaque polys, if any. If this value is non-NULL, nodes should send all non-opaque polys to the sorter instead of rendering them.
See also:
setNonOpaqueSorter()
int DzDrawStyle::pass (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The current pass number (second passes are draw for the hidden line and wire shaded styles)
See also:
setPass()
DzDrawStyle::PickingMode DzDrawStyle::pickMode (  )  const
Returns:
The current picking mode
bool DzDrawStyle::selectionMapsEnabled (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if selection maps are enabled, false if selection maps are disabled. This is only valid for node picking draw operations.
See also:
setRenderQuality()
void DzDrawStyle::setDrawCuesDefault ( bool  onOff  ) 

Set whether or not visual cues (such as bounding boxes for selected nodes) should be drawn when appropriate.

Parameters:
onOff If true, visual cues will be drawn when appropriate, if false, visual cues will not be drawn.
See also:
drawCues()
void DzDrawStyle::setDrawObjectsOnly ( bool  onOff  ) 

Set whether or not only objects should be drawn

Parameters:
onOff If true, non-objects (i.e. lights, etc) will not be drawn, if false, all nodes will be drawn.
See also:
drawObjectsOnly()
void DzDrawStyle::setDrawShadowCastersOnly ( bool  onOff  ) 

Set whether or not only shadow casters should be drawn

Parameters:
onOff If true, only objects that cast shadows will be drawn, if false, all nodes will be drawn.
See also:
drawShadowCastersOnly()
void DzDrawStyle::setNonOpaqueSorter ( DzPolySorter *  sorter  ) 

Set the non-opaque sorter for the current drawing operation

Parameters:
sorter A pointer to a poly sorter that will sort polygons with transparency from front to back before drawing them.
See also:
nonOpaqueSorter()
void DzDrawStyle::setPass ( int  pass  ) 

Set the current render pass number.

Parameters:
pass The number of the current rendering pass.
See also:
pass()
void DzDrawStyle::setPickMode ( PickingMode  mode  )  [protected]

Sets the picking mode for the current drawing operation

Parameters:
mode The picking mode for the drawing operation.
void DzDrawStyle::setRenderQuality ( bool  onOff  ) 

Set whether or not the draw is render quality.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the scene will be drawn appropriately for a hardware-rendering operation, otherwise, the scene will be drawn normally.
See also:
renderQuality()
void DzDrawStyle::setTransMode ( TransparencyMode  mode  ) 

Set the current transparency mode.

Parameters:
mode The mode that nodes will use for drawing polygons with transparency
See also:
transMode()
DzSceneShader * DzDrawStyle::shader (  )  const [inline, virtual, slot]
Returns:
The scene shader for this draw operation, if any.

Reimplemented in DzDefaultStyle.

DzDrawStyle::ShadeStyle DzDrawStyle::shadeStyle (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The shading style for the current drawing operation
DzDrawStyle::TransparencyMode DzDrawStyle::transMode (  )  const
Returns:
The current transparency mode
See also:
setTransMode()

Property Documentation

bool DzDrawStyle::drawObjectsOnly [read, write]
Returns:
true if non-objects (i.e. lights, etc) should not draw themselves, false if all nodes should be drawn.
See also:
setDrawObjectsOnly()
bool DzDrawStyle::drawShadowCastersOnly [read, write]
Returns:
true if only objects that cast shadows should be drawn, false if all nodes should be drawn.
See also:
setDrawShadowCastersOnly()
bool DzDrawStyle::isUserStyle [read]
Returns:
true if the drawStyle is of type DzUserDrawStyle
bool DzDrawStyle::renderQuality [read, write]
Returns:
true if objects should be drawn appropriately for a render via OpenGL, false for normal OpenGL drawing operations.
See also:
setRenderQuality()
